templateData.kat:
The Giraffe Pet can have its rarity upgraded from {{Common}} all the way up to {{Legendary}} by Kat. When upgrading [[Pets]] through Kat the pet will keep all of its Pet Experience. However due to the scaling EXP needed the pet will lose some [[Pets#Leveling|Pet Levels]] depending on the new rarity. Kat will reduce the amount of {{Coins}} needed per level of the Pet. This discount is {{color|green|0.3%}} per level of the base price. {{Kat Cost |cost_common_level_1 = {{Coins|15,000}}
1 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_acacia_log.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Acacia Log]] [[Enchanted Acacia Log]] |cost_common_level_100 = {{Coins|10,500}}
1 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_acacia_log.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Acacia Log]] [[Enchanted Acacia Log]] |time_common = 1 Day |cost_uncommon_level_1 = {{Coins|75,000}}
16 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_acacia_log.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Acacia Log]] [[Enchanted Acacia Log]] |cost_uncommon_level_100 = {{Coins|52,500}}
16 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_acacia_log.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Acacia Log]] [[Enchanted Acacia Log]] |time_uncommon = 2 Days |cost_rare_level_1 = {{Coins|900,000}}
128 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_acacia_log.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Acacia Log]] [[Enchanted Acacia Log]] |cost_rare_level_100 = {{Coins|630,000}}
128 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_acacia_log.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Acacia Log]] [[Enchanted Acacia Log]] |time_rare = 7 Days |cost_epic_level_1 = {{Coins|9,000,000}}
512 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_acacia_log.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Acacia Log]] [[Enchanted Acacia Log]] |cost_epic_level_100 = {{Coins|6,300,000}}
512 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_acacia_log.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Acacia Log]] [[Enchanted Acacia Log]] |time_epic = 12 Days |rarity_low = {{Common}} |rarity_high = {{Legendary}} |cost_total_level_1 = {{Coins|9,990,000}}
657 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_acacia_log.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Acacia Log]] [[Enchanted Acacia Log]] |cost_total_level_100 = {{Coins|6,993,000}}
657 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_acacia_log.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Acacia Log]] [[Enchanted Acacia Log]] |time_total = 22 Days }}
